thread.title: Bills catch flak for underwhelming season so far

title: Bills catch flak for underwhelming season so far
text:
Bills catch flak for underwhelming season so far 
Updated: Wednesday, October 21 2015, 06:30 PM EDT 
London, UK -- Bills Defensive Coordinator Dennis Thurman has caught a lot of flak for Buffalo’s underwhelming performances so far this year. 
Thurman and the Bills are in London now and still catching flak. 
Click the video for the full report. Bills catch flak for underwhelming season so far Related Stories Entertainment News
